title: Which of the following was a serious constituti...

content.question: Which of the following was a serious constitutional question after the Civil War?

choices.label: The restoration of the power of the federal judiciary
The legality of the national banking system
The political and legal status of the former Confederate states
The relationship between the United States and Britain

content.answer: The political and legal status of the former Confederate states

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
